articles.title: North Headquarters of Pomminryon Slashes at Lee Group of Traitors for Suppressing South Headquarters
articles.content:
North Headquarters of Pomminryon Slashes at Lee Group of Traitors for Suppressing South Headquarters
						
 Pyongyang, June 14 (KCNA) -- Shortly ago, the Lee Myung Bak regime of south Korea imposed heavy penalties on leading members of the South Headquarters of the Pan-national Alliance for Korea's Reunification (Pomminryon) on groundless charges of "infiltration and escape" and "possession of enemy-benefiting literature" for the mere reason that they had frequent discussions on reunification with its north counterpart.
					 It also arrested and detained the chief editor of "True Path to Be Followed by the Nation", the organ of the South Headquarters, on charges of "contempt of court" and "praise and encouragement". He strongly protested against the court's penalty.
					
					 The North Headquarters of Pomminryon in a statement on Thursday branded the action taken by the Lee Myung Bak group as a hideous act of inciting the confrontation with compatriots and a crime against reunification as it is intended to arrest the national movement for reunification and mercilessly violates even the elementary rights of human beings.
					
					 The puppet group's harsh suppression of leading members of the South Headquarters on charges of "enemy-benefiting activities" is nothing but its last-ditch efforts to completely stamp out the headquarters standing in the van of the actions for social democracy and the movement for reunification and thus weaken the forces of the reunification movement and prolong its remaining days, the statement said, and went on:
					
					 The group took this action at a time when it was kicking up a frantic reactionary burlesque such as campaign for "eliminating the forces following the north" in which the north is regarded not as compatriots but as "an enemy" and not as a partner for reunification but as a target of rejection. This more clearly shows what the group is seeking through this racket. 
					
					 Lurking behind this is a sinister aim to direct the spearhead of fascist crackdown to the organizations and personages of the reunification movement including the South Headquarters of Pomminryon and create a terror-ridden atmosphere throughout society in a bid to realize its ambition to stay in power through the up-coming "presidential election." 
					
					 The statement urged the Lee group to abolish the "Security Law", an evil law against human rights and reunification, immediately release the pro-reunification figures including the unreasonably detained members of the South Headquarters of Pomminryon and guarantee the freedom of activities for reunification.

articles.title: CPV Hopes for Steady Development of Exchange and Cooperation with WPK
articles.content:
CPV Hopes for Steady Development of Exchange and Cooperation with WPK 
						
 Pyongyang, June 14 (KCNA) -- Le Hong Anh, member of the Political Bureau of the C.C., the Communist Party of Vietnam (CPV) and standing secretary of its Secretariat, met and had a friendly talk with the delegation of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) headed by Kim Yong Il, alternate member of the Political Bureau and secretary of the C.C., the Workers' Party of Korea, on June 13.
					 Le Hong Anh once again extended warm congratulations to the dear respected Kim Jong Un on his election as first secretary of the WPK at the Fourth Conference of the WPK.
					
					 Referring to the fact that the Korean people grandly celebrated the centenary of the birth of President Kim Il Sung, he continued:
					
					 We are pleased that the traditional relations of friendship and cooperation between the two countries and the two parties provided by President Ho Chi Minh and President Kim Il Sung have favorably developed.
					
					 The party, government and people of Vietnam always remember the material and moral support rendered by the party, government and people of the DPRK to the Vietnamese people in their struggle for the independence and reunification of the country and socialist construction in the past.
					
					 It is our hope that the exchange and cooperation between the two parties will steadily grow in various fields.
					
					 We wish the party and people of the DPRK greater successes in the building of a thriving socialist nation under the wise leadership of Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The party, government and people of Vietnam will stand on the side of the Korean people in the future, too.

articles.title: DPRK Railway Ministry Delegation Returns Home
articles.content:
DPRK Railway Ministry Delegation Returns Home
 Pyongyang, June 14 (KCNA) -- The delegation of the DPRK Ministry of Railways led by Minister Jon Kil Su came back home Thursday after taking part in the 40th ministerial meeting of the Railway Cooperation Organization in Azerbaijan.

articles.title: Participants in Int'l Insurance Seminar Visit Birthplace of Kim Il Sung
articles.content:
Participants in Int'l Insurance Seminar Visit Birthplace of Kim Il Sung
 Pyongyang, June 14 (KCNA) -- Participants in the Pyongyang International Insurance Seminar visited Mangyongdae, birthplace of President Kim Il Sung, in Pyongyang.
					 They were the secretary general of the Federation of Afro-Asian Insurers and Reinsurers, delegates and members of delegations of companies of Russia, Sudan, Switzerland, Britain, Australia, India, China and Tanzania and a delegation of the Kumgang Insurance Company of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan.
					
					 They visited the old home of Kim Il Sung and looked round historic relics preserved there, being briefed on his revolutionary history and his patriotic and revolutionary family members.
					
					 Hammam Badr, secretary general of the Federation of Afro-Asian Insurers and Reinsurers, said he got to know well about the revolutionary history of Kim Il Sung, adding the President's exploits will remain long.
					
					 Kevin Scott, department director of the Cunningham Lindsey International of the U.K., said he used to get great impression whenever he visited Mangyongdae.
					
					 He added he got a good understanding of the Korean people and other world peoples' respect for Kim Il Sung.
					
					 The participants visited the Migok Co-op Farm and the Folk Street in Sariwon city, North Hwanghae Province and Ryongmun Cavern and enjoyed an art performance given by the Samjiyon Band of the Mansudae Art Troupe.

articles.title: Homage Paid to Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Homage Paid to Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il 
						
 Pyongyang, June 14 (KCNA) -- Han Chun Hui, widow of the former president of the International Taekwon-Do Federation (ITF), and her party and the delegation of the ITF visited the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il on Mansu Hill on Thursday.
					 They laid bouquets before the statues and paid tribute.
					
					 They arrived in Pyongyang Thursday to take part in the memorial event to mark the 10th anniversary of death of Choe Hong Hui, former president of the ITF.

articles.title: Gift to Kim Jong Un from Cambodian Businessperson
articles.content:
Gift to Kim Jong Un from Cambodian Businessperson
 Pyongyang, June 14 (KCNA) -- The dear respected Kim Jong Un received a gift from the president of the Mong Reththy Group of Cambodia on a visit to the DPRK.
					 The gift was handed to an official concerned by the president on Wednesday.

articles.title: Nigerian Embassy Members Help DPRK Farmers
articles.content:
Nigerian Embassy Members Help DPRK Farmers
						
 Pyongyang, June 14 (KCNA) -- Ambassador Maclean Igonikon Omuso and staff members of the Nigerian embassy here did friendship work on the DPRK-Nigeria Friendship Chilgol Vegetable Farm in Mangyongdae District, Pyongyang Thursday.
					 The guests helped farmers in weeding a field.
					
					 During a break, they talked with officials of the farm, deepening friendship.
					
					 They handed aid materials over to the farm.

articles.title: Continued Struggle for Country's Reunification Called for
articles.content:
Continued Struggle for Country's Reunification Called for
						
 Pyongyang, June 14 (KCNA) -- Vanguard fighters of the Anti-Imperialist National Democratic Front (AINDF) and patriotic people will carry on a dynamic struggle to hasten the country's reunification under the leadership of the dear respected Kim Jong Un, true to the last instructions of leader Kim Jong Il. 
					 Jo Il Min, chief of the Pyongyang mission of the AINDF, said this in a press release on Thursday, a day before the 12th anniversary of the June 15 joint declaration adopted between the north and south of Korea.
					
					 He went on:
					
					 Getting stronger in the mind of south Korean people is reverence for Kim Jong Il who ushered in the June 15 era of reunification. He is the eternal sun of the nation that led all the compatriots to struggle for national reunification in the spirit of the June 15 joint declaration.
					
					 The inter-Korean relations have worsened since the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors came to power.
					
					 The south Korean people clearly understood that neither the development of inter-Korean relations nor peace and reunification of the country and the prosperity common to the nation can be achieved as long as the traitors' reckless moves for confrontation with compatriots are left intact. 
					
					 The desperate efforts on the part of the reactionaries at home and abroad can never stem the advance of the June 15 era.
					
					 Kim Jong Un is standing in the van of the cause of the country's reunification.
					
					 The country's reunification would surely be achieved as there is Kim Jong Un. This is the faith of the south Korean people.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Start of Work at WPK Central Committee Marked
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Start of Work at WPK Central Committee Marked
						
 Pyongyang, June 14 (KCNA) -- Agricultural workers and officials and members of the women's union on Thursday celebrated the 48th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's start of work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 Agricultural workers held poem and song presentation "We Will Follow Party Forever" in Samjigang-ri of Jaeryong County, South Hwanghae Province.
					
					 Officials and members of the women's union held a poem recitation "We Will Remain Loyal to Our Great Party for All Ages" in Pyongyang.
					
					 The performers of the poem and song presentation that raised the curtain with poem and chorus "Glory to Our Great Party" praised the revolutionary exploits of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Its repertoire included poem and story-telling "We Have Mother", female chorus "Mother Party", male solo "Nilriri of Single-Minded Unity" and poem and chorus "We'll Travel One Road Forever".
					
					 The performers showed the revolutionary enthusiasm of the agricultural workers of the DPRK to take the road forever following the party, true to the leadership of the dear respected Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The performers of the poem recitation praised the greatness of Kim Jong Il in such numbers as poem "Song of June", vocal quartet "You Are Mother", poem "Our Lifeline" and chorus "Hearts Following General".
					
					 The performers sang high praises of single-minded unity of the Korean people who advance along the road indicated by the party, with the dear respected Kim Jong Un at the top post of the Workers' Party of Korea and the revolution.

articles.title: World Blood Donor Day Observed in DPRK
articles.content:
World Blood Donor Day Observed in DPRK
 Pyongyang, June 14 (KCNA) -- An event took place here Thursday to mark World Blood Donor Day.
					 Present there were officials in the field of public health, voluntary blood donors, students of Pyongyang Medical College of Kim Il Sung University and employees of Blood Transfusion . Also present were members of the WHO mission in the DPRK, the delegation of the International Federation of Red Cross and Red Crescent Societies working in the DPRK and the delegation of the International Committee of the Red Cross.
					
					 Kang Ha Guk, vice-minister of Public Health, made a speech to be followed by congratulatory speeches by Yonas Tegegen Woldemariam, representative of the WHO in the DPRK, and Jim Charles Dawe, acting head of the delegation of the Federation working in the DPRK.
					
					 The speakers referred to the significance of the Day and blood transfusion services now under way with the help of the WHO and the Federation.
					
					 They called for safe blood supply for people's health and life to suit the theme of the WHO for this year.
					
					 Certificates and souvenirs were handed over to voluntary blood donors at the event.
					
					 The participants enjoyed an art performance given by the art squad of the Central Committee of the Kim Il Sung Socialist Youth League, before looking round photos on display and playing sports and amusement games.
					
					 The Day was also observed in all provinces on the same day.

articles.title: DPRK People Inspired by Kim Jong Un's Treatise
articles.content:
DPRK People Inspired by Kim Jong Un's Treatise
 Pyongyang, June 14 (KCNA) -- The dear respected Kim Jong Un's treatise titled "The Great Comrade Kim Il Sung Is the Eternal Leader of Our Party and People" has deeply moved the officials and workers in coal industry, too.
					 Kim Chang Sok, department director of the Ministry of Coal Industry, told KCNA:
					
					 "I read Kim Jong Un's treatise carefully. It deals with undying feats of precedent leaders, Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.
					
					 In view of fundamental requirements of the revolution and out of his strong sense of moral obligation, Kim Jong Il had Kim Il Sung held in high esteem as eternal leader of the Workers' Party and the people of Korea as well as eternal President of the DPRK. With Kim Il Sung's behests as WPK's guideline, he aroused the whole party and army and all the people to carry them into practice.
					
					 Ｗe, officials of the ministry, will remain intensely loyal to Kim Jong Un, deeply aware of the idea of the treatise."
					
					 Jo Tong Chol, pit manager at the February 8 Jikdong Youth Coal Mine of the Sunchon Area Youth Coal Mining Complex, said:
					
					 "As the treatise says, we will always remain faithful to our mission and obligation as befitting descendants of Kim Il Sung and soldiers and disciples of Kim Jong Il under any circumstances.
					
					 We are now determined to effect a new upsurge in coal output under the torch of Hamnam, the torch of industrial revolution in the new century kindled by Kim Jong Il."

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Strong Sense of Moral Obligation
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Strong Sense of Moral Obligation
 Pyongyang, June 14 (KCNA) -- The dear respected Kim Jong Un made public a treatise titled "The Great Comrade Kim Il Sung Is the Eternal Leader of Our Party and People" on April 20 to mark the centenary of the birth of President Kim Il Sung.
					 The treatise has evoked big repercussions upon the people in the Democratic People's Republic of Korea.
					
					 Jon Ha Chol, director of the Philosophy Institute of the Academy of Social Sciences, told KCNA:
					
					 "The dear respected Kim Jong Un's treatise is a guideline to be maintained steadfastly in holding President Kim Il Sung in high esteem as the eternal sun of Juche and accomplishing his revolutionary cause.
					
					 The treatise stirs up my deep yearning for the President, who devoted all his life to the wellbeing of the people.
					
					 Cherishing as his faith the revolutionary principle that the popular masses are responsible for the revolution and construction and that they are capable of promoting them, Kim Il Sung solved all the problems in keeping with the interests and demand of the people by enlisting their great energy and ingenuity.
					
					 Absolute trust in and devotion to the people were the secret of all victories the President had won leading the revolution and construction through unprecedented hardships and trials.
					
					 He had always regarded the popular masses as his teacher and himself as a son faithful to them."
					
					 O Nam Chol, an officer of the Korean People's Army, said:
					
					 "The treatise represents Kim Jong Un's steadfast will to hold President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il in high esteem as eternal leaders and creditably accomplish the revolutionary cause of Juche under the banner of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism.
					
					 Kim Jong Un is, indeed, a preeminent leader and the great sun as he is realizing the cause of perpetuating the memory of the precedent leaders on the highest level with a strong sense of moral obligation."

articles.title: Women's Football Coach of DPRK
articles.content:
Women's Football Coach of DPRK
						
 Pyongyang, June 14 (KCNA) -- Among the sportspersons who have contributed to the development of women's football in the Democratic People's Republic of Korea is Kim Kyong Hui, a coach of the Amnokgang Sports Group.
					 The women's football team led by her placed first in the national premier league soccer matches, recently held as part of the Sports Contest for Pochonbo Torch Prize.
					
					 At the beginning of women's football in the country, she played a forward and a captain of the football team in the Sports Group.
					
					 She contributed to gaining silver medal for the DPRK at the 9th Asian Women's Football Championship.
					
					 During her career of 10 odd years as a coach, Kim has trained many footballers well known at home and abroad. Among them are Hong Myong Gum, O Kum Hui, Ri Jong Sim and Ri Yong Mi, who distinguished themselves in taking the titles of the 2006 U-20 Women's World Cup and the 1st U-16 Asian Women's Football Championship for the country.
					
					 She has also been active as an international football referee since 2002.
					
					 Kim told KCNA that she would devote herself to turning the DPRK into a football power by steadily improving her ability.

articles.title: Inter-Korean Declaration for National Reunification
articles.content:
Inter-Korean Declaration for National Reunification
						
 Pyongyang, June 14 (KCNA) -- A summit was held in Pyongyang between the north and the south of Korea in June, 12 years ago, amid great interest of all Koreans.
					 Since then, the Korean people had come into the June 15 era of reunification, demonstrating their will for independence and unity.
					
					 The advent of the era was attributable to the distinguished leadership ability and generosity of leader Kim Jong Il, who was implementing President Kim Il Sung's behests for national reunification.
					
					 He arranged a north-south summit in Pyongyang again in October Juche 96 (2007) to yield the Declaration for Development of North-South Relations and Peace and Prosperity, an action program for the June 15 Joint Declaration, putting the movement for independent reunification on a higher plane.
					
					 The inter-Korean declarations, the keynote of which is the idea of "By our nation itself", reflected the Korean people's desire and the demand of the times.
					
					 The June 15 joint declaration enjoyed full support from all Koreans, giving a momentum to the development of the north-south relations and the national reunification movement.
					
					 Reunions of families and relatives from the north and the south, separated for over half a century, took place in Pyongyang, Seoul, Mt. Kumgang Resort, Pusan, Taegu, Inchon and other places. Slogans of "Korea is one!" and "Reunification of Korea" had swept throughout the Korean Peninsula.
					
					 Meetings of organizations in the north and the south and overseas took place one after another, expanding the national reunification movement.
					
					Railways and roads, severed between the north and the south due to the outside forces, were reconnected, Mt. Kumgang tourism by land began and the Kaesong Industrial Zone appeared.
					
					 Sportspersons of the north and the south jointly attended world championships with the flag of the Korean Peninsula while artistes traveled to the north and the south to give art performances stirring up atmosphere for national reunification.
					
					 Besides, there were contacts between workers, peasants, youth and students, women, media persons, religionists and other people of the two sides, which displayed the Koreans' strong desire and will for national reunification.
					
					 Such eye-catching achievements clearly prove that independent reunification and national prosperity are possible only when the north-south declarations are observed.

articles.title: June 15 Joint Declaration Vital to Korea's Peace, Reunification
articles.content:
June 15 Joint Declaration Vital to Korea's Peace, Reunification
 Pyongyang, June 14 (KCNA) -- The June 15 Joint Declaration, adopted at the historic inter-Korean summit in June Juche 89 (2000), set forth the principle to achieve Korea's reunification by the nation itself. The adoption provided a new milestone in realizing the national reunification, the cherished desire of all Koreans.
					 But, the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors in south Korea has stood against the joint declaration, persisting in anti-DPRK policy, since it came to power.
					
					 Mad with inter-Korean confrontation, the group has said that "the north should not be considered the same nation to be in the same boat but a rival to stand against." Defining the DPRK as a "principal enemy", it worked out a "basic program for unification education" and a "guideline for unification education" to incite distrust and antagonism between the north and the south, and distributed to south Korean children comic books critical of the DPRK.
					
					 Meanwhile, the group is talking about "contingency" and "unification tax" in a foolish attempt for "unification under the liberal democratic system".
					
					 It even desecrated the nation's mourning over the great loss while launching military exercises against the DPRK gripped by deep sorrow at the demise of its leader. It went the lengths of hurting the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK.
					
					 After totally negating dialogue and cooperation between the north and the south, the Lee group of traitors has turned the Korean Peninsula into the world's most volatile region in league with the U.S. It deserves to be punished for such hideous crimes.
					
					 The history clearly proves that to implement the June 15 Joint Declaration is the only way for deterring a war and achieving peace and reunification in the Korean Peninsula.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Refers to WPK's Principle Governing Its Activities
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Refers to WPK's Principle Governing Its Activities 
 Pyongyang, June 14 (KCNA) -- The Workers' Party of Korea adheres to the firm principle of prioritizing the people's interests under any circumstance and condition, the steadfast stand of always thinking of their well-being and ensuring it in a far-sighted manner. This is the mode of activities for the WPK, which regards the people as the most precious beings.
					 Rodong Sinmun Thursday says this in a bylined article.
					
					 The WPK considers it as its supreme principle of its activities to steadily improve the people's living standard, the article notes, and goes on:
					
					 It is the WPK's intention to make a maximum use of the existing foundation and potential and direct primary efforts to the improvement of the standard of people's living so that they can be provided with greater benefits.
					
					 The WPK considers people as Heaven and teachers and spares nothing for them. People's will and wishes are the starting point of all its activities and all its policies are to meet to their interests and ensure their  happiness. The WPK effects even earth-shaking changes if people desire and it considers even a trifling thing as important if they like it.
					
					 Thanks to the WPK's popular policies modern streets, commercial and catering facilities and educational and cultural centers sprang up one after another in Pyongyang and various other parts of the country and the trait of fully ensuring people's convenience was established throughout society.
					
					 The WPK's loving care will reach every corner of the country when all officials bear in mind the WPK's idea of believing in people as in Heaven and thoroughly embody it, the article concludes.

articles.title: KCNA Commentary Slams Lee Myung Bak's Racket for "Eliminating Forces Following North"
articles.content:
KCNA Commentary Slams Lee Myung Bak's Racket for "Eliminating Forces Following North" 
						
 Pyongyang, June 14 (KCNA) -- The south Korean regime's racket for "eliminating forces following the north" began betraying its ulterior intention.
					 Lee in his public appearance said that the "forces following the north pose a greater problem than the north", not content with setting in motion vicious conservative elements, reptile papers and human scum in south Korea to trumpet about them.
					
					 What Lee uttered about those forces out of hysteria and uneasiness helps people from all walks of life in south Korea see through his ulterior aims.
					
					 Just as south Korean media commented shortly ago, Lee's reckless remarks were prompted by his political scenario to derail the solidarity among opposition parties by branding the democratic pro-reform forces as "forces following the north" and "Reds" and kick off a whirlwind of "coloring operation" in a bid to chill the atmosphere of the movement to judge the Lee Myung Bak regime. 
					
					 In a word, this is a "witch hunt" of modern version and an agitation of fascist political terrorism aimed to ensure the pro-U.S. conservative forces' stay in power.
					
					 The advance of progressive forces into the political camp cannot but be a telling blow to traitor Lee Myung Bak and the clan of the "Saenuri Party" that went unchallenged in their moves to fabricate pro-American, fascist and unpopular laws, occupying majority of seats of the "National Assembly." 
					
					 The conservative group feels extremely uneasy and fearful of the fact that the above-said development may hinder its implementation of the policy of confrontation and war and create a situation unfavorable for maintaining the puppet ruling system and ensuring its stay in power.
					
					 It was against this backdrop that the Lee group launched the "coloring operation" called campaign for "eliminating forces following the north".
					
					 The group's hue and cry over "forces following the north" proves that it is made up of die-hard flunkeys serving the U.S. and pro-Japanese lackeys.
					
					  The group of rat-like elements brought to light the true colors as sycophants and traitors and pro-American elements who tried to justify their suppression and persecution of progressive forces after crafting even phraseology of "forces following the north" intended to reject and hurt fellow countrymen.
					
					 What merits the most serious attention in south Korea at present is the fact that the sycophantic and traitorous forces are getting crazy with north-south confrontation and war hysteria after selling off the interests of the nation to outsiders lock, stock and barrel.
					
					 The puppet group's act of blindly toeing the U.S. line and the shackling alliance with the U.S. are wantonly infringing upon the interests of the nation and forcing the south Koreans to groan in the mire of misfortune and pain. 
					
					 Unspeakable are the sufferings imposed by the pro-American forces on the south Koreans. They result from the import of American beef infected with mad cow disease, the conclusion of south Korea-U.S. FTA, U.S. forces' atrocities and the financial burden caused by the covering of upkeep of the U.S. troops, etc. 
					
					 The facts go to clearly prove that it is not pro-reunification and patriotic forces desirous of alliance with the north but pro-U.S. sycophantic and country-selling and war forces that should be eliminated without delay.
					
					  It is the inevitability of the times and history that south Koreans of broad social strata are courageously turning out in the actions to judge Lee Myung Bak and the "Saenuri Party".

articles.title: Marathon for Reunification Held in S. Korea
articles.content:
Marathon for Reunification Held in S. Korea 

					 Pyongyang, June 14 (KCNA) -- "Marathon Wishing for Reunification" took place in Jonju of North Jolla Province on June 10 under the sponsorship of the provincial headquarters of the South Side Committee for Implementing the June 15 Joint Declaration.
					
					 The event marked the 12th anniversary of the June 15 joint declaration.
					
					 It brought together more than 2 500 people including members of civic and social bodies, citizens and school youth and children.
					
					 Speakers at the event said that south Korea is going along the road contrary to peace and reunification. They called for reversing it without delay.
					
					 Then the full text of the north-south joint declaration was read out.
					
					 The marathoners ran 6.15 km chanting "Forward for Peace! Forward for Reunification!" with the ardent desire for the country's reunification.

articles.title: S. Korean Prosecution Arrests Official of Pomminryon
articles.content:
S. Korean Prosecution Arrests Official of Pomminryon
 Pyongyang, June 14 (KCNA) -- The south Korean prosecution forcibly searched the house of Choe Tong Jin, chief editor of the South Headquarters of the Pan-national Alliance for Korea's Reunification (Pomminryon), and arrested him on June 11.
					 The puppet prosecution charged that he insulted the court and violated the "Security Law", claiming that he protested against the judgment on Chairman Ri Kyu Jae, former Secretary General Ri Kyong Won and former Chairperson of Publicity Committee Choe Un A of the South Headquarters of Pomminryon at the final hearing on an appeal that was held in the Seoul High Court on June 8.

articles.title: Erstwhile Military Dictator's Shameless Behavior under Fire
articles.content:
Erstwhile Military Dictator's Shameless Behavior under Fire
						
 Pyongyang, June 14 (KCNA) -- South Korean traitor Chun Doo Hwan and core elements of the dictatorial forces of the "Fifth Republic" appeared at a cadet school of the puppet army on June 8 to review the march of its cadets.
					 They laid a stumbling block in the way of the south Korean people's struggle for independence, democracy and reunification and turned the whole land of south into a scene of genocide.
					
					 They are, however, allowed to raise their heads and behave so shamelessly, touching off anger among people of all social standings.
					
					 A spokesman for the opposition Democratic United Party held a press conference in Seoul on Sunday condemning the forces which staged a military coup. He declared he could hardly repress resentment at the forces openly agitating the revival of dictatorship before people.
					
					 The spokesman demanded the rector of the cadet school and the minister of Defense own responsibility for this case and step down at once, stating it is absolutely intolerable.
					
					 The south Korean Internet radio "Voice of People" recalled on the same day that Chun Doo Hwan and his clique's shameless behaviors were opened to public by media, deploring that those forces are allowed to behave so shamelessly though they had been sentenced to death on charges of mass killings in Kwangju, etc.
					
					 "It is anachronistic to allow those forces who should be tried for massacre to review cadets' march", "it is a mockery and insult to people" and "it is aimed at reviving the forces of Fifth Republic".  These are angry shouts heard from among south Koreans of different social standings.

articles.title: S. Korean Authorities' Suppression of Progressive Forces Assailed
articles.content:
S. Korean Authorities' Suppression of Progressive Forces Assailed 
						
 Pyongyang, June 14 (KCNA) -- The South Headquarters of the Pan-national Alliance for Korea's Reunification (Pomminryon) released a statement on June 7 calling on all people to turn out in the actions to shatter the campaign of the puppet regime to eliminate the progressive forces, an action to stamp out the "forces following the north." 
					 The statement accused the conservative ruling forces of intensifying the suppression of the members of the South Headquarters of Pomminryon and threatening the people supporting the June 15 joint declaration under the pretext of "eliminating the forces following the north." 
					
					 It slammed Lee Myung Bak and Park Geun Hye for having revived the erstwhile fascist dictatorship and reduced south Korea to a permanent colony of the U.S. and society where human rights are suppressed and unethical crimes are rife.
					
					 It also accused the Lee "government" of branding the south-north cooperation and exchanges as illegal though they had been legally allowed in the period of preceding regimes.
					
					 The South Headquarters expressed the will to stage courageous actions against the U.S. and the corrupt Lee fascist regime keen on moves for a war against the north, while kicking up the ruckus for eliminating the "forces following the north." 
					
					 The statement called upon all people to launch actions to frustrate the repressive campaign of the conservative ruling forces and set up a democratic government.

articles.title: Actions against Conservative Forces Called for in S. Korea
articles.content:
Actions against Conservative Forces Called for in S. Korea
						
 Pyongyang, June 14 (KCNA) -- The Solidarity for Democracy, People's Life, Peaceful Reunification and Sovereignty of south Korea made public a statement on June 5 calling for frustrating the conservative forces' moves to eliminate the progressive forces and punishing the traitorous regime. 
					 The conservative ruling forces including Lee Myung Bak and the "Saenuri Party" have gone desperate to separate and disorganize the progressive parties and break the solidarity of the opposition camp in the wake of the prosecution's forceful search of the building of the Unified Progressive Party in May, the statement said, and went on:
					
					 Power bodies, conservative media and reptile organizations are joining in the moves.
					
					 Through the case the conservative ruling quarters are trying to put under control the ruling foundation driven into the crisis owing to corruption, irregularities and traitorous politics, and build a bridgehead for remaining in power. 
					
					 The progressive forces should closely unite and decisively frustrate the conservative forces' campaign of eliminating the "forces following the north" and the moves to separate the opposition camp. 
					
					 The progressive and democratic forces must target Lee Myung Bak and the "Saenuri Party" and form a strong united front. 
					
					 The progressive forces should resolutely fight against the coloring offensive and suppression by the conservative forces under the pretence of "security" with united strength for the "government" change desired by the people in the upcoming "presidential" election."

articles.title: S. Korean Authorities Urged to Implement June 15 Joint Declaration
articles.content:
S. Korean Authorities Urged to Implement June 15 Joint Declaration 
						
 Pyongyang, June 14 (KCNA) -- The Central Association of Korean Nationals in Russia issued a statement on Tuesday to mark the 12th anniversary of the June 15 joint declaration.
					 The statement noted that the way for ensuring the peace in the Korean Peninsula and survival of the nation is in sincerely implementing the June 15 joint declaration provided by leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 But the Lee Myung Bak regime of south Korea has violated the north-south joint declaration and is reviving the past era of confrontation, the statement said, adding:
					
					 Such a grim situation on the eve of a war would not have been created in the Korean Peninsula if the present south Korean authorities had implemented the joint declaration and the day of national reunification would have been accelerated but for the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors.
					
					 To prevent the danger of a nuclear war and ensure the nation's peaceful living it is necessary to bury the Lee group of traitors who is making desperate efforts on the deathbed.
					
					 Whoever is a member of the Korean nation should fight resolutely against the war moves of the Lee Myung Bak group and war-mongers at home and abroad, holding the banner of June 15 joint declaration wherever they live in with the consciousness of being responsible for the reunification of the country and the peace of the Korean Peninsula.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Work Carried by Pakistani Newspaper
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Work Carried by Pakistani Newspaper
						
 Pyongyang, June 14 (KCNA) -- The Pakistani newspaper Baluchistan Times on June 3 carried a detailed gist of the dear respected Kim Jong Un's work "On Effecting a Drastic Turn in Land Management to Meet the Requirements for Building a Thriving Socialist Nation".
					 The work, published on April 27, 2012, clarifies the undying exploits performed by President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il in land management and indicates the general orientation and tasks for face-lifting the country's land as befitting a thriving socialist nation.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Congratulatory Speech Posted by Peruvian Organization on Its Website
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Congratulatory Speech Posted by Peruvian Organization on Its Website
 Pyongyang, June 14 (KCNA) -- The Peruvian-Korean Institute of Culture and Friendship posted on its Internet website on June 7 the congratulatory speech made by the dear respected Kim Jong Un at the joint national meeting of the Korean Children's Union (KCU) organizations to mark the 66th anniversary of the KCU.
					 He in his speech expressed firm will to invariably carry forward the noble outlook of Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il on the younger generation and future and indicated the tasks and ways for preparing the KCU members as reserves knowledgeable, virtuous and healthy who would shoulder upon themselves the future of the country and the nation.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Immortal Exploits Praised by Uruguayan Paper
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Immortal Exploits Praised by Uruguayan Paper
Pyongyang, June 14 (KCNA) -- The Uruguayan paper La Juventud on June 2 carried an commemorative article to mark the 48th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's start of work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 The paper said in the article titled "Juche Idea and Kim Jong Il":
					
					 The Juche Idea publicly recognized as an idea guiding the human cause of independence would be unthinkable without President Kim Il Sung, its founder, and Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Kim Jong Il in his work published on February 19, 1974 clarified that the revolutionary idea of Kim Il Sung is an integral system of ideas, theories and methods of Juche and solemnly declared the Juche idea as Kimilsungism, a new and original idea which can go only by the august name of Kim Il Sung.
					
					 Kim Jong Il made public the work "On the Juche Idea" on March 31, 1982, giving overall answers to the issues arising in independent development of progressive mankind, the paper noted, adding that the work evoked a lively response worldwide.
					
					 The paper went on:
					
					 The works authored and published by Kim Jong Il deal with the development of the Juche idea and involve every field and sphere.
					
					 Kim Jong Il developed in depth the Songun idea based on the Juche idea, providing a treasured sword for winning one victory after another in accomplishing the human cause of independence.

articles.title: S. African Party Official Calls for Learning from Songun Politics
articles.content:
S. African Party Official Calls for Learning from Songun Politics 
 Pyongyang, June 14 (KCNA) -- Bonakele Majuba, secretary of the Mfumalanga Provincial Committee of the South African Communist Party, called for learning from the Songun politics of the DPRK in his lecture given after his return home from the celebrations of the centenary of the birth of President Kim Il Sung in the DPRK.
					 The participants in the Mfumalanga Provincial Conference of the South African Communist Party listened to the lecture given in the auditorium of University of Education in a city on June 2.
					
					 The secretary said:
					
					This time I witnessed for myself the DPRK which has been consolidated to be a powerful bulwark of socialism. All what I saw and heard was new and astonishing but what I felt, in particular, was that the DPRK is standing firm against the U.S. styling itself the only super power, saying what it wants to say. This is because the DPRK acquired invincible military capability and had access to powerful nuclear deterrent built by dint of Songun. The DPRK has firmly maintained its independent stand thanks to the powerful Songun politics of the Workers' Party of Korea. 
					
					 It is thanks to the Songun politics that the DPRK is towering high in the world as a military power and a bulwark of socialism which no enemy dares provoke.
					
					 Only victory is always in store for the DPRK advancing under the wise leadership of the dear respected Kim Jong Un.
					
					 We will positively support the just cause of the Korean people.

articles.title: IIJI Director-General Accuses S. Korean Regime of Its Anti-DPRK Hysteria
articles.content:
IIJI Director-General Accuses S. Korean Regime of Its Anti-DPRK Hysteria
						
 Pyongyang, June 14 (KCNA) -- Vishwanath, director-general of the International Institute of the Juche Idea (IIJI), issued a statement on June 7 accusing the Lee Myung Bak regime of south Korea of hurting the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK and kicking off confrontational hysteria against it. 
					 Recalling that the Korean people have registered unprecedentedly signal achievements in the building of a thriving nation, he said:
					
					 These achievements are something that stunned Lee Myung Bak and conservative media of south Korea as they only dreamed of the DPRK's frustration.
					
					 Much upset by this, Lee and the conservative media are resorting to impudent moves to shake the will of the Korean people by hurting the dignity of the DPRK supreme leadership which they regard as dearer than their own lives.
					
					 He condemned the ill-natured Lee and conservative media for committing again such thrice-cursed crime as hurting the dignity of the DPRK supreme leadership, displeased with the events taking place in Pyongyang to celebrate of the 66th anniversary of the Korean Children's Union. He extended support to the open ultimatum issued by the General Staff of the Korean People's Army in that regard.
					
					 Lee Myung Bak and the conservative media should stop their anachronistic confrontational hysteria against the DPRK and make apology to the Korean people on their knees, he said, declaring that they should clearly know this is the only way out for them.

articles.title: ITAR-TASS Gives Publicity to Successful Celebration of KCU Anniversary
articles.content:
ITAR-TASS Gives Publicity to Successful Celebration of KCU Anniversary
						
 Pyongyang, June 14 (KCNA) -- ITAR-TASS of Russia on June 10 gave publicity to the successful celebration of the 66th anniversary of the Korean Children's Union (KCU) in the DPRK.
					 It said as follows:
					
					 More than 20 000 exemplary students of primary and secondary schools across the country came to Pyongyang at invitation. They were specially selected from every nook and corner of the country including remote mountain villages and isolated islands.
					
					 The KCU delegates visited the Kumsusan Palace of the Sun where President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il lie in state and other places.
					
					 They enjoyed performances given by famous art troupes of the DPRK including the Pyongyang Circus and the popular Unhasu Orchestra.
					
					 Visits to the Central Zoo and the Central Botanical Garden were also organized in honor of the delegates.
					
					 The joint national meeting of the KCU organizations to celebrate its 66th anniversary took place at Kim Il Sung Stadium on June 6.
					
					 Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea and first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK, blessed the bright future of the younger generation at the meeting.
					
					 He in his speech called upon them to follow the examples set by heroic members of the Anti-Japanese Children's Corps and juvenile guerillas during the Fatherland Liberation War.
					
					 Sniffles could be heard among participants when the KCU congratulatory group referred to stories about immortal exploits of leader Kim Jong Il in the celebration poem.
					
					 At the meeting the KCU members pledged to remain intensely loyal to leader Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Around 215 Million Children Fall Victims to Child Labor
articles.content:
Around 215 Million Children Fall Victims to Child Labor
						
 Pyongyang, June 14 (KCNA) -- Many children in the world are not receiving necessary education, being exposed to hard labor.
					 Around 215 million children are victims of child labor, with nearly half in the worst conditions of such exploitation, reported the International Labor Organization.

articles.title: Direccion Nortena de APRP denuncia represion a entidad homologa del Sur
articles.content:
Direccion Nortena de APRP denuncia represion a entidad homologa del Sur
						
Pyongyang, 14 de junio (ACNC) -- Hace poco, la banda del traidor surcoreano Lee Myung Bak sentencio a duras penas a los integrantes principales de la Direccion Surena de la Alianza Pannacional por la Reunificacion de la Patria (APRP) por los absurdos cargos de la "infiltracion y fuga" y la "posesion de materiales proenemigos", aunque ella no hizo otra cosa que debatir con frecuencia el tema de reunificacion con la entidad homologa del Norte (RPDC).
					Por otra parte, detuvo y encarcelo al jefe de la Redaccion del organo de esa entidad "Ruta de la nacion", quien habia participado como observador en ese juicio y protestado fuertemente tal fallo cruel, por los cargos de "insulto al tribunal" y "elogio y estimulo al Norte".
					
					Al respecto, el portavoz de la Direccion Nortena de la APRP publico el dia 14 una declaracion que sigue:
					
					Tal proceder de la banda de Lee es un crimen anti-reunificacion que busca el enfrentamiento fratricida entre ambas partes coreanas, sofoca el movimiento nacional por la reunificacion y viola hasta los derechos elementales del hombre.
					
					Al reprimir brutalmente a los miembros principales de la Direccion Surena de la APRP, los traidores surcoreanos quisieron desintegrar esa entidad al frente del movimiento por la democratizacion de sociedad y la reunificacion, debilitar a las fuerzas partidarias de reunificacion y alargar los dias contados de su vida politica.
					
					Especificamente, esa embestida coincide con la reaccionaria campana de "purga de las fuerzas pro-Norte" que se lanza en el Sur de Corea definiendo al Norte de Corea no como connacional y contraparte de reunificacion sino como "enemigo" y blanco de rechazo.
					
					La siniestra intencion de la banda de Lee consiste en desatar panico en toda la sociedad surcoreana al dirigir la flecha de represion fascista a la Direccion Surena de la APRP y otras entidades y personalidades luchadoras por la reunificacion y favorecer asi su retoma del poder en las proximas "elecciones presidenciales".
					
					La camarilla de Lee tiene que abolir la infame "ley de seguridad" anti-DDHH y anti-reunificacion, liberar de inmediato a los integrantes de la Direccion Surena injustamente encarcelados y otras personalidades pro-reunificacion y garantizar la libertad de las actividades de reunificacion.

articles.title: Participantes en seminario del seguro visitan Mangyongdae
articles.content:
Participantes en seminario del seguro visitan Mangyongdae
						
Pyongyang, 14 de junio (ACNC) -- Visitaron Mangyongdae el secretario general de la Federacion de Agentes Afro-Asiaticos del Seguro y Reseguro, los delegados y delegaciones de las companias de Rusia, Sudan, Suiza, Gran Bretana, Australia, la India, China y Tanzania y los miembros de la delegacion de la Sociedad Anonima de Seguro de Kumgang de la Chongryon (Asociacion General de Coreanos Residentes en Japon), participantes en el Seminario Internacional de Seguro de Pyongyang.
					En la casa natal del Presidente Kim Il Sung, los huespedes pasaron revista a los objetos conservados escuchando explicaciones sobre la historia revolucionaria del Presidente y los miembros patrioticos y revolucionarios de la familia de Mangyongdae.
					
					El secretario general de la federacion mencionada, Hammam Badr, dijo que pudo conocer mejor la historia revolucionaria del Presidente a traves de esta visita y prosiguio que seran eternas las proezas realizadas por el.
					
					Cada vez que visito Mangyongdae, me quedo profundamente impresionado, confeso Kevin Scout, director de departamento de la Internacional Cunningham Lindsey S. A. de Gran Bretana, y continuo que la visita le hizo constar los testimonios de gran respeto que tienen el pueblo coreano y los otros del mundo al Presidente.
					
					Por otra parte, ellos recorrieron la Granja Cooperativa de Migok y la avenida folclorica de la ciudad de Sariwon de la provincia de Hwanghae del Norte, la cueva Ryongmun y presenciaron la funcion de la banda Samjiyon del Conjunto Artistico Mansudae.

articles.title: Organizaciones de masas alaban hazanas de Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Organizaciones de masas alaban hazanas de Kim Jong Il
						
Pyongyang, 14 de junio (ACNC) -- Tuvieron lugar este jueves los actos dedicados al 48o aniversario del inicio del trabajo del Dirigente Kim Jong Il en el Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea.
					El cenaculo de poesias y canciones de los trabajadores agricolas "Marcharemos para siempre por el unico camino siguiendo al partido" se efectuo en la comuna de Samjigang del distrito de Jaeryong de la provincia de Hwanghae del Sur, y la recitacion de poesias "Enalteceremos de generacion en generacion a nuestro gran partido" de funcionarias y gremiales de la Union de Mujeres Democraticas de Corea (UMDC), en Pyongyang.
					
					En el acto de los trabajadores agricolas, que se inicio con la oda y coro "Gloria a nuestro gran partido", los participantes alabaron pateticamente las hazanas revolucionarias del Dirigente           Kim Jong Il.
					
					En varias piezas como la narracion en poesia "Contamos con madre", el coro femenino "Oh, Partido-Madre", el solo masculino "Niliri de unidad monolitica" y la poesia y coro "Iremos siempre por nuestro camino", demostraron bien el entusiasmo revolucionario de los trabajadores agricolas coreanos de seguir fielmente a la direccion de Maximo Dirigente Kim Jong Un y el partido.
					
					El acto de la UMDC represento emocionantemente la noble personalidad del Dirigente con diversos programas como la poesia "Cancion del junio", el quinteto "Usted es madre", la poesia "Nuestra linea de vida", el coro "Alma seguidora al General" y etc.
					
					Los ejecutantes expusieron la unica voluntad del pueblo coreano que avanza siguiendo al partido al enaltecer en el puesto cimero del PTC y la revolucion al Maximo Dirigente Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Acto dedicado al Dia Mundial de Donantes de Sangre
articles.content:
Acto dedicado al Dia Mundial de Donantes de Sangre
						
　Pyongyang, 14 de junio (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar este jueves en esta capital el acto dedicado al Dia Mundial de Donantes de Sangre.
					  Estuvieron presentes en la ocasion los funcionarios de la rama de la salud publica, los voluntarios donantes de sangre y los estudiantes de la Escuela de Medicina de Pyongyang, adscrita a la Universidad Kim Il Sung.
					
					　Igualmente participaron los miembros de las representaciones de la Organizacion Mundial de Salud, las delegaciones de la Federacion Internacional de Sociedades de la Cruz Roja y la Medialuna Roja y del Comite Internacional de la Cruz Roja, que trabajan ahora en Corea.
					
					　En la ocasion hizo uso de la palabra Kang Ha Guk, viceministro coreano de la Salud Publica y pronunciaron discursos de felicitacion Yonas Tegegen Woldemariam, delegado de la OMS y Jim Charles Dawe, jefe interino de la delegacion de dicha federacion.
					
					　Los oradores se refirieron al significado del Dia Mundial de Donantes de Sangre y el servicio de transfusion de sangre que se efectua bajo la cooperacion de la OMS y la susodicha federacion.
					
					　Ademas, subrayaron la necesidad de hacer bien este trabajo para la salud y la proteccion de vida de los hombres, de acuerdo con el tema presentado este ano por la OMS.
					
					　En el acto fueron entregados el diploma y los articulos de recuerdo a los voluntarios donantes de sangre.
					
					　Luego de presenciar la funcion ofrecida por el grupo central de propaganda artistica juvenil, los participantes pasaron revista a las fotos exhibidas para la ocasion y realizaron los juegos deportivos de recreacion.
					
					　El mismo dia, tambien todas las provincias celebraron este dia mundial.
